A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a great Star Wars films. I cannot understand why it's only getting 57% audience score. I can only assume it's the same so called \"hardcore\" fans who loved the prequels at first only to hate them once the rose colored glasses came off. This will go down as one of the best in the series. They are wrong on this just like those who hated Empire at first. The critics have this one right and I don't get to say that a lot.
